articles.title: Ukraine rains fire on retreating Russians - POLITICO Europe

articles.title: Paschal Donohoe refuses to rule himself out of top job at bailout fund - Independent.ie
articles.description: Finance Minister Paschal Donohoe refused to rule himself out of the running to take over as head of Europe’s bailout fund on the fringes of a meeting of European finance ministers in Luxembourg.

articles.title: Nearly 48 million animals culled in Europe's 'largest ever' bird flu epidemic - Euronews
articles.description: Health authorities say 37 European countries have recorded cases of bird flu since October 2021.
articles.content:
The latest outbreak of bird flu is the most serious epidemic in Europe on record, according to health authorities.
